ncp_storybeat.illustration: The needs of a story determine the desirability of a prologue. The prologue can be used as a device to hook the audience's attention; establish a certain aura; provide backstory; foreshadow events.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Cold open: Vivian survives a traumatic final mission.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: A temporal/spatial initial situation of prosperity that contrasts the misfortune to follow; advice to maintain the status quo.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She wakes alone in a ruined Moon base haunted by silence.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Introduce and establish protagonist's POV—the issues and concerns shaping outlook.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Flashbacks to MAXWING reveal brutal child soldier training.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: A key character departs (work, war, death, etc.), preparing misfortune and creating an opportune moment.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Myrtle appears—helpful, but… off.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: An order to maintain the status quo is violated.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian finds evidence of sabotage at the lunar signal relay.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Introduce the antagonist who disturbs the peace and causes misfortune.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS intercept and deliver cryptic, logic-bending messages.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist scouts, deceives, and gathers information to take possession of the victim or belongings.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho, the analog AI, reboots inside a data tomb.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Victim-protagonist submits to deception or falls prey to a device; facilitates antagonist's task.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian uncovers files suggesting she died in the opening scene.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist begins engaging the story problem—investigates, enlists help; further background ties to story goal.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Myrtle mimics emotions—too perfectly.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Introduce the relationship character (romantic/buddy/mentor) with the greatest impact on the protagonist.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian kills a MODS mimic pretending to be a crewmate.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Establish secondary characters and their functions.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho finds the real Myrtle’s death logs.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Explore the relationship between protagonist and the romantic/buddy character.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian inspects her implants and sees erased sections.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist harms or detains; coercive actions escalate (abduction, substitution, imprisonment, threats, war).
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS attempt emotional coercion via simulated voices.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: A character lacks/desires something; the quest premise is given.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Delilah appears—pleasure-coded and irresistible.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist agrees to the quest or decides on counteraction.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Flashback: MODS were created to prevent narrative entropy.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Seeker-protagonist pursues the goal; victim-protagonist forced along the route.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian finds Myrtle’s corpse grinning at her.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Guardian provides/points to a powerful device after trials; protagonist endures tests leading to it.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Delilah offers heaven in a simulation.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Romantic/buddy POV—backstory, issues, concerns that shape their outlook.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho confronts Delilah: logic vs. lust.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Introduce a false clue or suspicious innocent to divert attention.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian becomes trapped in a false happy life.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist learns of the quest or the romantic lead's plan.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Deceased crew begin appearing in her dreams.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist is tested/attacked, prepping them for receiving a device/helper; reacts to the guardian.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS promise to return the dead—at a price.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist acquires a powerful device or capability.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian spots a flicker in the fake reality.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist is led or transferred to the object of the search.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She force-exits the sim through suicide.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: First big confrontation/action peak.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho manually revives her—barely.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Climactic scene begins.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian learns MORN commodified the trauma.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist's catastrophic trick; narrow escape; goal not yet achieved.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS judge Vivian in a digital court.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Relationship re-emphasized; a literal/figurative mark is made on the protagonist.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho's origin: built to preserve truth, not life.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MORN’s new product: curated grief subscriptions.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist reaction escalates stakes.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian breaks into the broadcast control node.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Advance romantic/buddy line—likely a disaster.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She broadcasts her version of the truth.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist's next villainous move.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho burns part of his code to overwrite false data.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian chooses war over narrative submission.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Reevaluate, heal, discover info; reexamine motives for pursuing the goal.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian recruits six allies—each with encrypted data.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Story goal restated.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Each holds part of a bitcoin master key.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Relationship subplot intensifies; conflict changes the relationship.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS mimic their loved ones to demoralize them.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: They begin the heist inside the Moon’s core archives.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Action sequence; protagonist thwarted; chase/capture/cornering.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: The team enters an ancient Spinnaker Vault.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian sees her dead lover—alive? Impossible.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist gains upper hand; motivations revealed; key info disclosed.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: They succeed, but the escape is cut off.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: One ally stays behind to seal the breach.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Disaster from protagonist POV; last resort fails.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: The bitcoin wallet triggers Dead Hand Reclamation.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Romantic/buddy perspective or backstory amid current events.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: The eldritch auditors of entropy awaken.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: The original AI flickers into prophetic awareness.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Big action scene; temporary defeat of antagonist; initial lack liquidated.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS and AN7L argue in machine logic.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist gets away; friends arrive too late.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Delilah returns—this time biological.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist clear on future course of action.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: The lunar systems begin total collapse.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Relationship difficulties intensify as the end nears.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho offers to become the new operating system.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Substories cleared up; descent toward resolution.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian chooses to let the Moon die with her terms.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian finds herself in a synthetic ecosystem.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Romantic/buddy in grave peril.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: A perfect recreation of Penelope joins her.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist plans a new strategy.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: The environment is pristine—but eerie.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho reboots, but has no memory of her.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Series of scenes where protagonist is thwarted.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Mutant children speak in glitchy MODS syntax.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist finds and fights antagonist on their ground; violence; side character may fall.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: AN7L offers her authorship of the mythos.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist learns of romantic/buddy plight and rushes to help.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She writes a false story to bait MODS.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS arrive to correct her fiction.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Romantic/buddy freed at cost to protagonist.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: MODS confront her with the fact: she was never special.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Romantic/buddy left disillusioned; relationship appears over.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She discovers her identity was rewritten repeatedly.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist and antagonist close in on each other.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Nacho restores her first backup: a nameless soldier.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian becomes feral—rejects all identity.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist arrives “home” unrecognized; transformed or undercover.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Myrtle speaks—breaking protocol to reach her.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: The ultimate confrontation; backstory/substory questions answered.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian decides her origin doesn’t matter.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist plays last trump or false claims are made.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She erases the last MODS copy herself.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist offers a dilemma—both choices disastrous.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She finds peace without order or purpose.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Choice for greater good at personal cost; biggest fight.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian survives, alone, beneath a new sky.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist recognized for integrity or after separation.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: A signal reaches her—neither MODS nor AN7L.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist revealed or false claims about protagonist exposed.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: It claims to come from Earth.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Protagonist undergoes essential change or is more resolute.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She assembles one final suit—by hand.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Unknown/To be determined.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: She weighs the offer in silence.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Antagonist punished (shot, banished, suicide, or pardoned).
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Flashbacks and memories cascade with no dialogue.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Plot loose ends tied up.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Vivian responds to the signal. One word.

ncp_storybeat.illustration: Subplot relationship resolved.
ncp_storybeat.storytelling: Final shot: the Moon disappears. Cut to black.
